item.description:
The wind's supposed to be good and the weather's supposed to be warmish (low 70s) so I'm looking for someone to crew for me on a 420 out of Community Boating sometime after 1 PM. I'm flexible on times -- of course, the wind will determine the best times -- but the requirements are somewhat restrictive: You must
-- be <= 130 lbs.
-- have a wetsuit
-- be somewhat experienced in handling a jib on a performance boat in medium to high winds.
-- be somewhat intrepid: Not afraid to get dunked (though I very rarely capsize; it's still a possibility) or to go fast.
item.name: Crew on a 420 in the Basin
